;= alias
fa=doskey /macros | findstr /i $1
la=doskey /macros
re=doskey /macrofile=%doskey%

;= notepad
n=notepad $1

;= dos commands
sb=dir /s/b $*
findh=%envDir%find.bat . $1 $2
findv=findstr /slinp /C:"$*" *
find=findstr /slimp /C:"$*" *
kill=taskkill /f /im $*

;= root dirs
c=pushd c:\

;= pushd
pd=pushd $*
.=pushd ..
..=pushd ..\..
...=pushd ..\..\..
....=pushd ..\..\..\..
.....=pushd ..\..\..\..\..

;= popd
p=popd
pp=popd && popd
ppp=popd && popd && popd
pppp=popd && popd && popd && popd
ppppp=popd && popd && popd && popd && popd

;= git
gs=git status
ga=git add .
gc=git commit -m $*
gl=git log -1 $1
nuke=git clean -fdXq
scorch=git clean -fdXq -e !dls

;= build
verbuild=msbuild %verProj% /v:m
shim=msbuild %shimProj% /t:dumpProjects
restore=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:nugetRestore
dryRun=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:dryRun /p:Configuration="debug" /p:ShimProperties="$*"
build=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:build /p:Configuration="debug" /p:ShimProperties="$*"
clean=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:clean /p:Configuration="debug" /p:ShimProperties="$*"
rbuild=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:build /p:Configuration="release" /p:ShimProperties="$*"
rclean=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:clean /p:Configuration="release" /p:ShimProperties="$*"
abuild=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:build /p:Configuration="\"release;debug\"" /p:ShimProperties="$*"
aclean=msbuild %shimProj% /v:m /t:clean /p:Configuration="\"release;debug\"" /p:ShimProperties="$*"

;= link
linkdir=mklink /j $1 $2
diruse=subst $1 $2
